quotes.quote: If he's forgotten me, I'll make him remember me. I'll make him want me again.
I want people to remember me as someone whose life has been helpful to humanity.
If you remember me, then I don't care if everyone else forgets.
If you can remember me, I will be with you Today, Tomorrow and always.
If I'm going to be anything more than average, if anyone is going to remember me, then I need to go further, in art, in life, in everything!
If I'm not around I hope you'll remember me and together we will hold on to our favorite song.
It doesn't matter. You are what you are. I am what I am. We are the same-when you take the time to remember me.
One day you will hear the sound of time rustling as it slips through your fingers like sand. Remember me then. I wish you luck.
I want to change the world, and do something valuable and beautiful. I want people to remember me before I'm dead, and then more afterwards.
I hope people will remember me as one who did her best - and who wasn't an anachronism.
Remember me not for the ill I've done but for the good I've dreamed.

When you remember me, it means you have carried something of who I am with you, that I have left some mark of who I am on who you are. It means that you can summon me back to your mind even though countless years and miles may stand between us. It means that if we meet again, you will know me. It means that even after I die, you can still see my face and hear my voice and speak to me in your heart.
Remember me in your dreams, as I will you.
Remember me with smiles and laughter, for that is how I will remember you all. If you can only remember me with tears, then don't remember me at all.
If there ever comes a day when I'm not able to appreciate you, remember you will be in my heart whatever I do.
My goal is that after I am dead and gone, I want people to remember me for the person I am.
Remember me, even if it's only in a corner and secretly. Don't let me go.
Remember me for these days, not the old ones.
Survival is an ancient dream life is nothing but an everlasting illusion nothing is real don't believe in illusion, Remember me, I am here.
The best course for My lover is to remember Me wholeheartedly as much as one can and leave the rest to Me
For as long as you remember me, I am never entirely lost.
There is no death, daughter. People die only when we forget them,' my mother explained shortly before she left me. 'If you can remember me, I will be with you always.
You can keep the things of bronze and stone and give me one man to remember me just once a year.
I hope people remember me for the kind of person that I am, not because of what I do.
Remember me, even if it's only in a corner and secretly. Don't let me go.
Teaching is a very noble profession that shapes the character, caliber, and future of an individual. If the people remember me as a good teacher, that will be the biggest honour for me.
Remember me and smile, for it's better to forget than to remember me and cry.
Lord, remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom.
Remember me not for the ill I've done but for the good I've dreamed.
